name: Meteor Storm DX
description:
Meteor Storm DX is a remake of the previously released Meteor Storm for the MSX. The game is as simple as it gets- fly through an asteroid field, and don't get hit! The game was rewritten in a compiled language to run much smoother than the previous version, and removes PSG and SCC support in favor of the Yamaha SFG-01 and SFG-05 FM Synthesizer Units. 

The game can be played right here on this page via webMSX or can be downloaded to play on your own computer. The minimum requirements are:

  • MSX (any generation) with 64KB RAM
  • MSX-MUSIC or SFG compatible audio expansion cartridge
  • MSX-DOS

Also recommended is a paddle controller or mouse, although this game is also playable with a joypad or keyboard. Please note that the mouse is only supported for MSX2 and above, and the paddle requires TRNEWDRV.COM to be ran first before playing on a Turbo-R.

Source code is available here.

Original game from which this is based co-written by Maddie Russell. Music playroutine uses code written by Grauw from the MSX Assembly Page. The embedded web version of the game runs on webMSX. webMSX was created and is owned by ppeccin, The webMSX and disk versions of the game include an MSX-DOS boot disk. MSX-DOS is (c) 2018 The MSX Licensing Corporation.

Please enjoy!
